statements: DELETE FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE building_name = 'Green Tower';
DELETE FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE building_id = 100 AND certification_level = 'Platinum';
DELETE FROM Green_Building_Certification WHERE certification_date < '2022-01-01' AND sustainability_score > 80;
DELETE FROM building_certification WHERE id = 1 AND certification_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE building_id = 102 AND energy_consumption > 500;
DELETE FROM CertificationAgency WHERE agency_name = 'GreenBuild' AND location = 'New York';
DELETE FROM CertificationOrganizations WHERE organization_name = 'GreenCertify' AND certification_programs = 5;
DELETE FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE energy_consumption > 500 AND water_usage < 1000;
